select p.id, p.name, p.schema_name, p.table_name, p.column_name, p.metric_type, p.job_type, p.status, p.start_time, p.end_time, p.update_time from () p
LOWER(p.`name`) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{searchVal})), '%')
AND LOWER(p.schema_name) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{schemaSearch})), '%')
AND LOWER(p.table_name) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{tableSearch})), '%')
AND LOWER(p.column_name) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{columnSearch})), '%')
order by p.update_time desc
select p.status as `name`, count(1) as `value` from () p GROUP BY p.status
select p.create_date, status, count(1) as num from () p group by p.create_date,p.status order by create_date
